name: Crab's pipes
description:
This is a game about crab  exploring pipes to find diamonds.

The crab can go left or right.

Controls:
  • A and D
  • Left and right arrows
  • Mouse press on left or right part of the screen
  • Touch on left or right part of the screen

This game is still in development and only have 2 levels now. Android version are in development. Your suggestions are highly appreciated!
